subject: Pytest tests not showing on BrowserStack dashboard
description:
We are running 19 Pytest tests using the BrowserStack SDK. The tests execute locally and all pass, but when run via `browserstack-sdk pytest`, the BrowserStack dashboard shows 0 tests reported. The WebDriver session appears to start but immediately fails during setup.

Environment:
- Python 3.11.6
- Selenium 4.15.2
- browserstack-sdk 1.2.3
- pytest 7.4.3
- OS: Ubuntu 22.04 (GitHub Actions runner)

Our browserstack.yml has projectName and buildName configured. We also have `parallel: 5` set.

The error in our CI logs shows:
```
browserstack-sdk: Initializing session...
ERROR webdriver_init: Failed to create remote session
ValueError: Missing required key in config
pytest: collected 19 items
pytest: Aborting execution: session setup failed
```

We tried removing the parallel config and running with a single worker but the same error occurs. We verified our BROWSERSTACK_ACCESS_KEY and BROWSERSTACK_USERNAME are set correctly in the environment.

This started happening after we upgraded from browserstack-sdk 1.1.0 to 1.2.3 last week.
